Beats Per Minute.description: set the Beats Per Minute (BPM) [1..300]; default is 120

Beats in a Bar.description: set the Beats in a Bar [1..6]; default is 4

Begin loop command.description: begin loop(s). Ignore if it was running.

Chord creator.description: create a Chord from its string notation

Duration fraction operator.description:
Creates a new object for which the fraction of duration of all notes are changed.
The first parameter controls the fraction of the note, e.g. 1=whole, 0.5 or 2 = half, 0.25 or 4 = quarter, 0.125 or 8 = eight, 0.0625 or 16 = sixteenth.

Dynamic operator.description:
Creates a new modified musical object for which the dynamics of all notes are changed.
	The first parameter controls the emphasis the note, e.g. + (mezzoforte,mf), -- (piano,p).

Group operator.description: create a new sequence in which all notes of a musical object are grouped

Index getter.description: create an index getter (1-based) to select a musical object

Interval creator.description: create an integer repeating interval (from,to,by,method). Default method is 'repeat', Use next() to get a new integer

Iterator creator.description: iterator that has an array of constant values and evaluates to one. Use next() to increase and rotate the value.

Iterator creator [I].description: iterator that has an array of constant values and evaluates to one. Use next() to increase and rotate the value.

Join Map creator.description: creates a new join by mapping elements based on an index (1-based)

Join operator.description: joins two or more musical objects as one

Join operator [J].description: joins two or more musical objects as one

Loop creator.description: create a new loop from one or more musical objects; must be assigned to a variable

MIDI channel operator.description: select a MIDI channel, must be in [1..16]; must be a top-level operator

Multi track creator.description: create a multi-track object from zero or more tracks

Octave Map operator.description: create a sequence with notes for which the order and the octaves are changed

Octave operator.description: change the pitch of notes by steps of 12 semitones for one or more musical objects

Pitch operator.description: change the pitch with a delta of semitones

Play musical objects in the background.description: play all musical objects together in the background (do not wait for completion)

Progress creator.description: create a Chord progression using this format

Random generator.description: create a random integer generator. Use next() to generate a new integer

Recording creator.description: create a recorded sequence of notes from the current MIDI input device

Repeat operator.description: repeat the musical object a number of times

Reverse operator.description: reverse the (groups of) notes in a sequence

Sequence Map creator.description: creates a mapper of sequence notes by index (1-based)

Track creator.description: create a named track for a given MIDI channel with a musical object

Track modifier.description: puts a musical object on a track to start at a specific bar

Undo dynamic operator.description: set the dymamic to normal for all notes in a musical object

Ungroup operator.description: undo any grouping of notes from one or more musical objects
